title: Sky-High Glamour with Exclusive Lounge Access
description: The very best of Singapore is on your doorstep at the five-star Westin Singapore, ideally located in the prestigious Marina Bay. Experience the rich history and modern flair of this electrifying city while enjoying a special dining experience and exclusive access to the Westin Club, located on the 35th floor of the hotel. Enjoy deluxe daily breakfast at Seasonal Taste, coffee, tea and soft drinks during the day, pre-dinner drinks and hors dâ€™oeuvres and more. Make it a family holiday with two kids aged 11 years and under staying for free in a Deluxe Room.
offer_address: 12 Marina View Asia Square Tower, 2, Singapore 018961
